menu.title: Farmhand Planner
menu.hint: Left click to toggle. Right click +/- on work hours to decrease.
hud.bill.unpaid: Not enough gold to hire the farmhand today (needs {0}g). No tasks will run.
hud.hired.ok: Your farmhand is ready to work today.
gmcm.helperEnabled.name: Enable farmhand
gmcm.helperEnabled.tooltip: If disabled, the farmhand won't work and you won't be charged each morning.
gmcm.key.name: Planner hotkey
gmcm.key.tooltip: Open the in-game Farmhand Planner menu.
gmcm.starthour.name: Start hour
gmcm.starthour.tooltip: Earliest hour the farmhand will start working (in-game time).
gmcm.endhour.name: End hour
gmcm.endhour.tooltip: Latest hour the farmhand will stop working (in-game time).
gmcm.water.name: Water crops
gmcm.pet.name: Pet animals
gmcm.feed.name: Feed animals
gmcm.harvest.name: Harvest crops
gmcm.chests.name: Organize chests
gmcm.lowtier.name: Harvest low-value only
gmcm.lowtier.tooltip: If enabled, the farmhand will skip crops worth more than the value cap.
gmcm.harvestcap.name: Value cap
gmcm.harvestcap.tooltip: Only harvest crops with sell price at or below this value (when low-value-only is enabled).
gmcm.excludeflowers.name: Exclude flowers
gmcm.excludeflowers.tooltip: Skip harvesting flowers so beehouses can keep their honey bonuses.
gmcm.costs.note: Costs are charged each morning before work starts. If you don't have enough gold, no tasks will run.
